amendment.description: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an increase in the Federal minimum wage.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4322, notwithstanding the adoption of the amendment and pursuant to the order of June 20, 2006, withdrawn in Senate.

reference.ref: printed in Senate Legislative Calendar of June 21, 2006 [pdf]

vote.text: Amendment SA 4322 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 179.

action.text: Amendment SA 4322 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6051; text: CR S6051) To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an increase in the Federal minimum wage.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4322 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 179.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4322 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 179.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4322 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
